Text:
I once saw a great solution for this kind of stupidity -- pick an uploader you can trust then download the torrent without reading the comments. 

Since there are people in this world who obviously didn't get enough love and attention as a child -- @clavidor, I'm talking to you -- it's now what I do for UFC torrents.

Date: 000 Etc.! So The Laughs On You.......DumbAss!

User Type: No One Reads Comments of UFC and Boxing
Username: Because They Know AssHoles Like You Are Going To Post Spoilers! You Wasting Your Time You Lose! Ha Ha Ha! UFC FREE FOREVER!!!
